entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
